   19: %%
   20: -module(core_alias_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -export([all/0, suite/0, groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   23:          init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   24:          tuples/1, cons/1, catastrophic_runtime/1,
   25:          coverage/1]).
   26: 
   27: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   28: 
   29: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   30: 
   31: all() ->
   32:     [{group,p}].
   33: 
   34: groups() ->
   35:     [{p,[parallel],
   36:       [tuples, cons, catastrophic_runtime, coverage]}].
   37: 
   38: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   39:     test_lib:recompile(?MODULE),
   40:     Config.
   41: 
   42: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   43:     ok.
   44: 
   45: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   46:     Config.
   47: 
   48: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   49:     Config.
   50: 
   51: id(X) -> X.
   52: 
   53: tuples(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   54:     Tuple = id({ok,id(value)}),
   55: 
   56:     true = erts_debug:same(Tuple, simple_tuple(Tuple)),
   57:     true = erts_debug:same(Tuple, simple_tuple_in_map(#{hello => Tuple})),
   58:     true = erts_debug:same(Tuple, simple_tuple_case_repeated(Tuple, Tuple)),
   59:     true = erts_debug:same(Tuple, simple_tuple_fun_repeated(Tuple, Tuple)),
   60:     true = erts_debug:same(Tuple, simple_tuple_twice_head(Tuple, Tuple)),
   61: 
   62:     {Tuple1, Tuple2} = id(simple_tuple_twice_body(Tuple)),
   63:     true = erts_debug:same(Tuple, Tuple1),
   64:     true = erts_debug:same(Tuple, Tuple2),
   65: 
   66:     Nested = id({nested,Tuple}),
   67:     true = erts_debug:same(Tuple, nested_tuple_part(Nested)),
   68:     true = erts_debug:same(Nested, nested_tuple_whole(Nested)),
   69:     true = erts_debug:same(Nested, nested_tuple_with_alias(Nested)),
   70: 
   71:     true = erts_debug:same(Tuple, tuple_rebinding_after(Tuple)),
   72: 
   73:     Tuple = id(unaliased_tuple_rebinding_before(Tuple)),
   74:     false = erts_debug:same(Tuple, unaliased_tuple_rebinding_before(Tuple)),
   75:     Nested = id(unaliased_literal_tuple_head(Nested)),
   76:     false = erts_debug:same(Nested, unaliased_literal_tuple_head(Nested)),
   77:     Nested = id(unaliased_literal_tuple_body(Nested)),
   78:     false = erts_debug:same(Nested, unaliased_literal_tuple_body(Nested)),
   79:     Nested = id(unaliased_different_var_tuple(Nested, Tuple)),
   80:     false = erts_debug:same(Nested, unaliased_different_var_tuple(Nested, Tuple)).
   81: 
   82: simple_tuple({ok,X}) ->
   83:     {ok,X}.
   84: simple_tuple_twice_head({ok,X}, {ok,X}) ->
   85:     {ok,X}.
   86: simple_tuple_twice_body({ok,X}) ->
   87:     {{ok,X},{ok,X}}.
   88: simple_tuple_in_map(#{hello := {ok,X}}) ->
   89:     {ok,X}.
   90: simple_tuple_fun_repeated({ok,X}, Y) ->
   91:     io:format("~p~n", [X]),
   92:     (fun({ok,X}) -> {ok,X} end)(Y).
   93: simple_tuple_case_repeated({ok,X}, Y) ->
   94:     io:format("~p~n", [X]),
   95:     case Y of {ok,X} -> {ok,X} end.
   96: 
   97: nested_tuple_part({nested,{ok,X}}) ->
   98:     {ok,X}.
   99: nested_tuple_whole({nested,{ok,X}}) ->
  100:     {nested,{ok,X}}.
  101: nested_tuple_with_alias({nested,{ok,_}=Y}) ->
  102:     {nested,Y}.
  103: 
  104: tuple_rebinding_after(Y) ->
  105:     (fun(X) -> {ok,X} end)(Y),
  106:     case Y of {ok,X} -> {ok,X} end.
  107: unaliased_tuple_rebinding_before({ok,X}) ->
  108:     io:format("~p~n", [X]),
  109:     (fun(X) -> {ok,X} end)(value).
  110: unaliased_literal_tuple_head({nested,{ok,value}=X}) ->
  111:     io:format("~p~n", [X]),
  112:     {nested,{ok,value}}.
  113: unaliased_literal_tuple_body({nested,{ok,value}=X}) ->
  114:     Res = {nested,Y={ok,value}},
  115:     io:format("~p~n", [[X,Y]]),
  116:     Res.
  117: unaliased_different_var_tuple({nested,{ok,value}=X}, Y) ->
  118:     io:format("~p~n", [X]),
  119:     {nested,Y}.
  120: 
  121: cons(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  122:     Cons = id([ok|id(value)]),
  123: 
  124:     true = erts_debug:same(Cons, simple_cons(Cons)),
  125:     true = erts_debug:same(Cons, simple_cons_in_map(#{hello => Cons})),
  126:     true = erts_debug:same(Cons, simple_cons_case_repeated(Cons, Cons)),
  127:     true = erts_debug:same(Cons, simple_cons_fun_repeated(Cons, Cons)),
  128:     true = erts_debug:same(Cons, simple_cons_twice_head(Cons, Cons)),
  129: 
  130:     {Cons1,Cons2} = id(simple_cons_twice_body(Cons)),
  131:     true = erts_debug:same(Cons, Cons1),
  132:     true = erts_debug:same(Cons, Cons2),
  133: 
  134:     Nested = id([nested,Cons]),
  135:     true = erts_debug:same(Cons, nested_cons_part(Nested)),
  136:     true = erts_debug:same(Nested, nested_cons_whole(Nested)),
  137:     true = erts_debug:same(Nested, nested_cons_with_alias(Nested)),
  138:     true = erts_debug:same(Cons, cons_rebinding_after(Cons)),
  139: 
  140:     Unstripped = id([a,b]),
  141:     Stripped = id(cons_with_binary([<<>>|Unstripped])),
  142:     true = erts_debug:same(Unstripped, Stripped),
  143: 
  144:     Cons = id(unaliased_cons_rebinding_before(Cons)),
  145:     false = erts_debug:same(Cons, unaliased_cons_rebinding_before(Cons)),
  146:     Nested = id(unaliased_literal_cons_head(Nested)),
  147:     false = erts_debug:same(Nested, unaliased_literal_cons_head(Nested)),
  148:     Nested = id(unaliased_literal_cons_body(Nested)),
  149:     false = erts_debug:same(Nested, unaliased_literal_cons_body(Nested)),
  150:     Nested = id(unaliased_different_var_cons(Nested, Cons)),
  151:     false = erts_debug:same(Nested, unaliased_different_var_cons(Nested, Cons)).
  152: 
  153: simple_cons([ok|X]) ->
  154:     [ok|X].
  155: simple_cons_twice_head([ok|X], [ok|X]) ->
  156:     [ok|X].
  157: simple_cons_twice_body([ok|X]) ->
  158:     {[ok|X],[ok|X]}.
  159: simple_cons_in_map(#{hello := [ok|X]}) ->
  160:     [ok|X].
  161: simple_cons_fun_repeated([ok|X], Y) ->
  162:     io:format("~p~n", [X]),
  163:     (fun([ok|X]) -> [ok|X] end)(Y).
  164: simple_cons_case_repeated([ok|X], Y) ->
  165:     io:format("~p~n", [X]),
  166:     case Y of [ok|X] -> [ok|X] end.
  167: 
  168: nested_cons_part([nested,[ok|X]]) ->
  169:     [ok|X].
  170: nested_cons_whole([nested,[ok|X]]) ->
  171:     [nested,[ok|X]].
  172: nested_cons_with_alias([nested,[ok|_]=Y]) ->
  173:     [nested,Y].
  174: 
  175: cons_with_binary([<<>>,X|Y]) ->
  176:     cons_with_binary([X|Y]);
  177: cons_with_binary(A) ->
  178:     A.
  179: 
  180: cons_rebinding_after(Y) ->
  181:     (fun(X) -> [ok|X] end)(Y),
  182:     case Y of [ok|X] -> [ok|X] end.
  183: unaliased_cons_rebinding_before([ok|X]) ->
  184:     io:format("~p~n", [X]),
  185:     (fun(X) -> [ok|X] end)(value).
  186: unaliased_literal_cons_head([nested,[ok|value]=X]) ->
  187:     io:format("~p~n", [X]),
  188:     [nested,[ok|value]].
  189: unaliased_literal_cons_body([nested,[ok|value]=X]) ->
  190:     Res = [nested,Y=[ok|value]],
  191:     io:format("~p~n", [[X, Y]]),
  192:     Res.
  193: unaliased_different_var_cons([nested,[ok|value]=X], Y) ->
  194:     io:format("~p~n", [X]),
  195:     [nested,Y].
  196: 
  197: catastrophic_runtime(Config) ->
  198:     ct:timetrap({minutes, 6}),
  199:     Depth = 16000,
  200: 
  201:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
  202:     Path = filename:join(PrivDir, "catastrophic_runtime.erl"),
  203: 
  204:     Term = catastrophic_runtime_1(Depth),
  205:     Source = ["-module(catastrophic_runtime). t(Value) -> ", Term, "."],
  206:     ok = file:write_file(Path, Source),
  207: 
  208:     {ok, catastrophic_runtime} = compile:file(Path, [return_error]),
  209:     file:delete(Path),
  210: 
  211:     ok.
  212: 
  213: catastrophic_runtime_1(0) ->
  214:     <<"Value">>;
  215: catastrophic_runtime_1(N) ->
  216:     Nested = catastrophic_runtime_1(N - 1),
  217:     Integer = integer_to_binary(N),
  218:     Eq = [<<"{{'.',[],[erlang,'=:=']},[],[Value, \"">>, Integer, <<"\"]}">>],
  219:     [<<"{{'.',[],[erlang,atom]},[],[">>, Nested, <<",">>, Eq, <<"]}">>].
  220: 
  221: coverage(_Config) ->
  222:     State = id({undefined,undefined}),
  223:     {State, "Can't detect character encoding due to lack of indata"} =
  224:         too_deep(State),
  225:     ok.
  226: 
  227: too_deep({_,undefined} = State) ->
  228:     {State, "Can't detect character encoding due to lack of indata"}.
  229:
